name: rssbox
description: RSSBox is a self-hosted tool to back up RSS feeds and convert web pages into readable feeds. Supports API, scheduling, and integrations with external readers.
features: Feed backup: Archive RSS feeds locally to preserve content even if sources disappear.
Web to RSS: Convert websites without RSS feeds into readable feed formats.
Scheduled fetching: Automatically check and update feeds at configured intervals.
API access: Integrate with feed readers and other tools using REST endpoints.
Content extraction: Parse and clean article content for better readability.
Feed filtering: Create custom filters to include or exclude specific content.
Multiple formats: Generate RSS, Atom, or JSON feeds from the same source.
Reader integration: Connect to popular RSS readers like Feedly or Inoreader.
Historical archive: Keep old feed items even after they're removed from source feeds.
Custom rules: Define extraction rules for sites with non-standard layouts.
Proxy support: Fetch feeds through proxies to avoid rate limits or blocks.
Export functionality: Download archived feeds in standard formats for migration.
